name: *NEW* 14" 'Hortensia' Series 5 Little Apple Doll
description:
Laden with accessories, white haired garden spirit Hortensia is majick incarnate! Her story reveals much about 'the lives of apples...' One of four characters featured in The Lost Series

  • 14" tall (35.5 cm approx)
  • Outfit comprises of a red smock with lace detailing, short shorts (!), faux leather calf length boots, mismatched polyester socks, speckled wool scarf, basket of roses and a crown of paper & organza flowers
  • Vinyl body and hand-sewn clothing (100% cotton & nylon lace)
  • Features 'Story of Hortensia' book written and illustrated by Yurei
  • Doll is also presented with an apple and pins
  • This item contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 3 years old
  • Protoype photos shown here. Final doll may differ slightly from pictures but the artist endeavors to make this as minimal as possible
    • (Please note: This doll will ship early February 2014)

name: *NEW* 14" 'Argennon' Series 5 Little Apple Doll
description:
Argennon also known as The Little White Fox (from 2006 exclusive doll Praeses' origin story) joins The Lost Series, in 'human' form... One of four featured in The Lost Series

  • 14" tall (35.5 cm approx)
  • Outfit comprises of faux fur hat & tail, fleece over coat, polka dot ribbon head band and anglaise trim underskirt
  • Vinyl body and hand-sewn clothing (Synthetic blend fleece, 100% cotton & medium pile faux fur)
  • Features 'Story of Argennon' book written and illustrated by Yurei
  • Doll is also presented with an apple and pins
  • This item contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 3 years old
  • Protoype photos shown here. Final doll may differ slightly from pictures but the artist endeavors to make this as minimal as possible
    • (Please note: This doll will ship early February 2014)

name: *NEW* 14" 'Oscen' Series 5 Little Apple Doll
description:
Oscen 'The Raven Queen' is one of the two original characters released back in 2007. The artist has reverted back to her original vision of the character, which now includes an elaborate head dress. Her story reveals links with Charles Carrion who some might know as storyteller Kook Headcage's surly companion... One of four dolls featured in The Lost Series

  • 14" tall (35.5 cm approx)
  • Outfit comprises of black 'hakama' style trousers, 'hanten' waistcoat, black feather shawl and feathered beak headdress
  • Vinyl body and hand-sewn clothing (100% cotton & synthetic feathers)
  • Features 'Story of Oscen' book written and illustrated by Yurei Urie
  • Doll is also presented with an apple and pins
  • This item contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 3 years old
  • Protoype photos shown here. Final doll may differ slightly from pictures but the artist endeavors to make this as minimal as possible
(Please note: This doll will ship early February 2014)

name: *NEW* 14" 'Nix' Series 5 Little Apple Doll
description:
Nix, The Snow Princess is one of the two original characters released back in 2007. The artist has stayed with her original vision of the character but made some additions; decorative hair pieces and a beaded rosary. One of four dolls featured in The Lost Series
  • 14" tall (35.5 cm approx)
  • Outfit comprises of ivory Chinese silk overcoat, pure silk kimono 6cm pearl pins, silver plated snowflake hair pin and wooden bead rosary
  • Vinyl body and hand-sewn clothing (100% pure silk & silk dupion blend)
  • Features 'Story of Nix' book written and illustrated by Yurei
  • Doll is also presented with an apple and pins
  • This item contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 3 years old
  • Protoype photos shown here. Final doll may differ slightly from pictures but the artist endeavors to make this as minimal as possible
(Please note: This doll will ship early February 2014)

name: Little Apple Dolls 'Heart' Tee
description:
This fitted black fine knit tee, features the Little Apple Dolls’ generic ‘ghost faces’ huddled together in a heart shaped motif, on the lower right hand side of the garment.

A Little Apple Dolls/Screaming Matriarch exclusive.

  • Printed on Ladies Fruit of the Loom Fashion Fit, Value-weight shirts

name: Limited Edition 'Avia' 14" Little Apple Doll
description:
In celebration of Screaming Matriarch's 5th birthday, Little Apple Dolls creator Yurei Urie has created this special anniversary doll, Avia.

  • 14" tall (35.5 cm approx)
  • Includes black and white 'Birthday Doll' outfit and 'Edo' small print fabric kimono & obi style belt
  • Vinyl body and handmade clothing (100% cotton/poly-cotton blend)
  • Features 'Story of Avia' book written and illustrated by Yurei
  • Doll is also presented with an apple, miniature balloon and Certificate of Authentication, signed by the artist
  • Orders are limited to one doll per customer
  • This item contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 3 years old
(Please note: This doll will ship, late September 2013) *VERY LOW STOCK*

name: *NEW* Chibi Chibi Kooma 'Sora'
description:
Another Screaming Matriarch Exclusive! The Chibi Chibi Koomas are the brainchild of Kaz 'Mamakaz' Kuroda. Presenting Sora, the first of the Koomas who lives in the sky, loves sing-a-longs and travelling!
  • 8.2cm tall (3 1/4" approx)
  • Handmade wool figure
  • Recommended for ages 5+

name: *NEW* Chibi Chibi Kooma 'Kumo'
description:
A Screaming Matriarch Exclusive! The Chibi Chibi Koomas (literal translation: 'tiny, tiny bears') are the brainchild of Kaz 'Mamakaz' Kuroda. Electric blue Kumo is orginal kooma, Sora's best friend. She dreams of her home in the sky but until then games of badminton will keep her happy!

  • 8.2cm tall (3 1/4" approx)
  • Handmade wool figure
  • Recommended for ages 5+

name: *NEW* Chibi Chibi Kooma 'Laura'
description:
Another Screaming Matriarch Exclusive! The Chibi Chibi Koomas (literal translation: 'tiny, tiny bears') are the brainchild of Kaz 'Mamakaz' Kuroda. This chibi kooma's name is Laura and her hero is Bob Dylan. One day she woould like to travel all over the world singing her songs and playing her guitar to the masses!
  • 8.2cm tall (3 1/4" approx)
  • Handmade wool figure
  • Recommended for ages 5+

name: *NEW* Chibi Chibi Kooma 'Aqua'
description:
Another Screaming Matriarch Exclusive! The Chibi Chibi Koomas (literal translation: 'tiny, tiny bears') are the brainchild of Kaz 'Mamakaz' Kuroda. Chibi Kooma Aqua's favourite pastime is swimming at the beach while listening to the Beach Boys and spreading happiness to all the good folk in her native Tahiti!
  • 8.2cm tall (3 1/4" approx)
  • Handmade wool figure
  • Recommended for ages 5+

name: *NEW* Chibi Chibi Kooma 'Tom'
description:
Another Screaming Matriarch Exclusive! The Chibi Chibi Koomas (literal translation: 'tiny, tiny bears) are the brainchild of Kaz 'Mamakaz' Kuroda. Introducing 'Tom', the chocolate brown kooma who fell to earth and landed in Oxford! He is also the world's smallest Morrissey fan!
  • 8.2cm tall (3 1/4" approx)
  • Handmade wool figure
  • Recommended for ages 5+

name: *NEW* Chibi Chibi Kooma 'Rodney Dickinson'
description:
Another Screaming Matriarch Exclusive! The Chibi Chibi Koomas (literal translation: 'tiny, tiny bears) are the brainchild of Kaz 'Mamakaz' Kuroda. Meet Rodney Dickinson, named after a certain super tanned Bargin Hunt presenter because of his orange fur! This Kooma also hails from Stockport, England!
  • 8.2cm tall (3 1/4" approx)
  • Handmade wool figure
  • Recommended for ages 5+

name: *NEW* Limited Edition 'Lustravi' 14" Little Apple Doll
description:
A Little Apple Dolls collector's item. This 14" child of the Inbetween is officially the third doll from artist/creator Yurei Urie in 4 years and is strictly limited edition.

  • 14" tall (35.5 cm approx)
  • Vinyl body, handmade clothing (poly cotton blend)
  • Features 'Story of Lustravi' book written and illustrated by Yurei
  • Doll is also presented with an apple and Certificate of Authentication, signed by the artist
  • Orders are limited to one doll per customer
  • This item contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 3 years old
  • As all dolls are handmade, trim may vary slightly from the photo
(Please note: We aim to dispatch this doll within 8-10 days)
